endpoints.description: Retrieve the current status of all monitored forest product batches.
Submit a report on a newly initiated production batch.
Fetch optimized transportation routes for delivery of forest products.
Update the delivery schedule for a specific product.
Initiate a sustainability compliance audit for a given product batch.
View transportation logs for specific product deliveries.
Modify the monitoring operational status of an individual product batch.
Remove a previously submitted report by ID.
Generate analytics reports on overall production statistics and insights.
Submit feedback regarding the logistics and tracking processes.
